    Class: Epoch.Time.Gauge

    Defined in: coffee/time/gauge.coffee
    Inherits: Epoch.Chart.Canvas

    Overview

    Real-time Gauge Visualization. Note: Looks best with a 4:3 aspect ratio (w:h)

    Instance Method Summary

    • - (void) constructor(options = {}) Constructor Creates the new gauge chart.
    • - (void) update(value) Sets the value for the gauge to display and begins animating the guage.
    • - (Number) radius()
    • - (Number) centerX()
    • - (Number) centerY()
    • - (Number) textY()
    • - (Number) getAngle(value)
    • - (void) setStyles(selector) Sets context styles given a particular selector.
    • - (void) draw() Draws the gauge.
    • - (void) drawNeedle() Draws the needle.

    Inherited Method Summary

    Methods inherited from Epoch.Chart.Canvas

    #constructor, #getStyles

    Methods inherited from Epoch.Chart.Base

    #constructor, #setData, #update, #draw, #extent

    Methods inherited from Epoch.Events

    #constructor, #on, #off, #trigger

    Constructor Details

    - (void) constructor(options = {})

    Creates the new gauge chart.

    Parameters:

    • options (Object) — Options for the gauge chart.

    Options Hash: (option):

    • domain (Array) — The domain to use when rendering values (default: [0, 1]).
    • ticks (Integer) — Number of ticks to render (default: 10).
    • tickSize (Integer) — The length (in pixels) for each tick (default: 5).
    • tickOffset (Integer) — The number of pixels by which to offset ticks from the outer arc (default: 5).
    • fps (Integer) — The number of animation frames to render per second (default: 34).
    • format (Function) — The formatting function to use when rendering the gauge label (default: Epoch.Formats.percent).

    Instance Method Details

    - (void) update(value)

    Sets the value for the gauge to display and begins animating the guage.

    Parameters:

    • value (Number) — Value to set for the gauge.

    - (Number) radius()

    Returns:

    • (Number) — The radius for the gauge.

    - (Number) centerX()

    Returns:

    • (Number) — The center position x-coordinate for the gauge.

    - (Number) centerY()

    Returns:

    • (Number) — The center position y-coordinate for the gauge.

    - (Number) textY()

    Returns:

    • (Number) — The y-coordinate for the gauge text display.

    - (Number) getAngle(value)

    Parameters:

    • value (Number) — Value to translate into a needle angle.

    Returns:

    • (Number) — The angle to set for the needle given a value within the domain.

    - (void) setStyles(selector)

    Sets context styles given a particular selector.

    Parameters:

    • selector (String) — The selector to use when setting the styles.

    - (void) draw()

    Draws the gauge.

    - (void) drawNeedle()

    Draws the needle.
